links.title: MODIS/Terra Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid, Version 6
MODIS/Terra Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid, Version 6
MODIS/Terra Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid, Version 6

eo:bands.name: NDSI_Snow_Cover
eo:bands.description: Gridded NDSI snow cover and data flag values.

eo:bands.name: NDSI_Snow_Cover_Basic_QA
eo:bands.description: A general estimate of the quality of the algorithm result.

eo:bands.name: NDSI_Snow_Cover_Algorithm_Flags_QA
eo:bands.description: Algorithm-specific bit flags set for data screens and for inland water.

eo:bands.name: NDSI
eo:bands.description: Raw NDSI values (i.e. prior to screening).

eo:bands.name: Snow_Albedo_Daily_Tile
eo:bands.description: Daily snow albedo corresponding to the NDSI_Snow_Cover parameter.

eo:bands.name: orbit_pnt
eo:bands.description: Pointer to the orbit of the swath mapped into each grid cell. For details, see Section 1.1.2 below.

eo:bands.name: granule_pnt
eo:bands.description: Pointer for identifying the swath mapped into each grid cell. For details, see the section 'Using the granule_pnt' below.
